subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Tigers were the trendy choice to win the World Series after making those robust additions, but they opened the season 0-7 and finally won their first game Wednesday night, beating Boston, 7-2.
snippet: The Tigers were the trendy choice to win the World Series after making those robust additions, but they opened the season 0-7 and finally won their first game Wednesday night, beating Boston, 7-2.
